ConfigItem.Name: Home altitude
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies home altitude in meters above sea level

ConfigItem.Name: Home pressure
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies pressure reading at zero altitude

ConfigItem.Name: Baud Rate
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies the serial port baud rate

ConfigGroup.Name: Broadcast Rates - States
ConfigGroup.Description: Specifies which processed data is transmitted and at what rates

ConfigItem.Name: Broadcast Rate - Health
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Pose Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Quaternion Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Euler Angle Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Position Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Velocity Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Autopilot-generated State Commands
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Wind Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigGroup.Name: Broadcast Rates - NMEA Packets
ConfigGroup.Description: Broadcast settings for human-readable NMEA packet data

ConfigItem.Name: NMEA Health Broadcast Rate
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: NMEA Pose Broadcast Rate
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: NMEA Orientation Broadcast Rate
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: NMEA Sensor Broadcast Rate
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: All Processed Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Processed Accel Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Processed Gyro Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Processed Mag Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Processed Pressure Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Processed Temperature Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: All Raw Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Raw Accel Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Raw Gyro Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Raw Mag Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Raw Pressure Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Temperature Broadcast Rate (Hz)
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies how often states are transmitted over the serial line

ConfigItem.Name: Raw GPS Broadcast
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether GPS position data is transmitted automatically by the sensor

ConfigItem.Name: Satellite Status Broadcast Enabled
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies whether satellite status is transmitted automatically by the sensor

ConfigGroup.Name: Mag Calibration
ConfigGroup.Description: Magnetometer hard and soft iron calibration

ConfigGroup.Name: Gyro Trim
ConfigGroup.Description: Trim settings for maintaining gyro zero

ConfigItem.Name: Gyro X Trim
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies an x-axis trim value for maintaining zero output bias

ConfigItem.Name: Gyro Y Trim
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies a y-axis trim value for maintaining zero output bias

ConfigItem.Name: Gyro Z Trim
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies a z-axis trim value for maintaining zero output bias

DataItem.Name: Sats Used
DataItem.Description: Number of satellites used in the position/velocity solution

DataItem.Name: Sats in View
DataItem.Description: Number of satellites being tracked by the GPS

DataItem.Name: COM Overflow
DataItem.Description: This bit is set if the sensor is unable to transmit all requested data at requested rates

DataItem.Name: Abs Pressure
DataItem.Description: Bit set if pressure sensor fails to communicate properly

DataItem.Name: Accel
DataItem.Description: Bit set if accelerometer fails to communicate properly

DataItem.Name: Gyro
DataItem.Description: Bit set if rate gyro fails to communicate properly

DataItem.Name: Magnetometer
DataItem.Description: Bit set if magnetometer fails to communicate properly

DataItem.Name: GPS
DataItem.Description: Bit set if GPS fails to communicate properly

DataItem.Name: Raw X Gyro
DataItem.Description: Raw (unprocessed) data from x-axis rate gyro

DataItem.Name: Raw Y Gyro
DataItem.Description: Raw (unprocessed) data from y-axis rate gyro

DataItem.Name: Raw Z Gyro
DataItem.Description: Raw (unprocessed) data from z-axis rate gyro

DataItem.Name: Gyro raw time
DataItem.Description: Time at which gyro data was measured

DataItem.Name: Processed X Gyro
DataItem.Description: Processed data from x-axis rate gyro (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Processed Y Gyro
DataItem.Description: Processed data from y-axis rate gyro (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Processed Z Gyro
DataItem.Description: Processed data from z-axis rate gyro (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Gyro proc time
DataItem.Description: Time at which gyro data was measured (equivalent to gyro raw time)

DataItem.Name: Raw gyro temperature
DataItem.Description: Raw temperature reported by gyro temperature sensor

DataItem.Name: Processed gyro temperature
DataItem.Description: Processed temperature reported by gyro temperature sensor

DataItem.Name: Accel raw time
DataItem.Description: Time at which accel data was measured

DataItem.Name: Processed X Accel
DataItem.Description: Processed data from x-axis accelerometer (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Processed Y Accel
DataItem.Description: Processed data from y-axis accelerometer (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Processed Z Accel
DataItem.Description: Processed data from z-axis accelerometer (biases subtracted, scale factors and alignment compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Accel proc time
DataItem.Description: Time at which accel data was measured (equivalent to accel raw time)

DataItem.Name: Mag raw time
DataItem.Description: Time at which mag data was measured

DataItem.Name: Processed X Mag
DataItem.Description: Processed data from x-axis magnetometer (biases subtracted, soft and hard iron compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Processed Y Mag
DataItem.Description: Processed data from y-axis magnetometer (biases subtracted, soft and hard iron compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Processed Z Mag
DataItem.Description: Processed data from z-axis magnetometer (biases subtracted, soft and hard iron compensation applied)

DataItem.Name: Mag proc time
DataItem.Description: Time at which mag data was measured (equivalent to mag raw time)

DataGroup.Name: Pressure Data
DataGroup.Description: Raw and processed barometric pressure data

DataItem.Name: Raw Absolute Pressure
DataItem.Description: Raw (unprocessed) data from barometric pressure sensor

DataItem.Name: Raw Absolute Pressure Time
DataItem.Description: Time at which raw (unprocessed) data was received

DataItem.Name: Processed Absolute Pressure
DataItem.Description: Processed data from barometric pressure sensor

DataItem.Name: Processed Absolute Pressure Time
DataItem.Description: Time at which processed data was received

DataGroup.Name: Temperature Data
DataGroup.Description: Data from all temperature sensors on the board

DataItem.Name: Raw board temperature
DataItem.Description: Raw temperature reported by onboard temperature sensor

DataItem.Name: Processed board temperature
DataItem.Description: Processed temperature reported by onboard temperature sensor

DataItem.Name: Raw gyro temperature
DataItem.Description: Raw temperature reported by gyro temperature sensor

DataItem.Name: Processed gyro temperature
DataItem.Description: Processed temperature reported by gyro temperature sensor

DataItem.Name: Time
DataItem.Description: System time of current angle data

DataGroup.Name: RC Transmitter Data
DataGroup.Description: Data received by a connected RC transmitter

Register.Name: Desired Altitude
Register.Description: Desired altitude for altitude control loop

Register.Name: Desired Sink Rate
Register.Description: Desired sink rate for sink rate control loop

Register.Name: Desired Pitch
Register.Description: Desired pitch for pitch control loop

Register.Name: Desired Roll
Register.Description: Desired roll for roll control loop

Register.Name: Line-following Direction (N)
Register.Description: Direction unit-vector for line-following path definition

Register.Name: Line-following Direction (E)
Register.Description: Direction unit-vector for line-following path definition

Register.Name: ACCEL_RAW_XY
Register.Description: Raw X and Y accel data

Register.Name: ACCEL_TIME
Register.Description: Time that raw accelerometer data was acquired

Register.Name: MAG_RAW_XY
Register.Description: Raw X and Y mag data

Register.Name: MAG_RAW_Z
Register.Description: Raw Z mag data and time

Register.Name: MAG_RAW_TIME
Register.Description: Time that raw magnetometer data was received

Register.Name: GYRO_PROC_TIME
Register.Description: Time at which processed gyro data was received

Register.Name: ACCEL_PROC_TIME
Register.Description: Time at which accel data was received

Register.Name: MAG_PROC_TIME
Register.Description: Time at which mag data was received

Register.Name: PRESSURE_PROC_TIME
Register.Description: Time of processed absolute pressure data

Register.Name: EULER_TIME
Register.Description: Time at which Euler angle data was computed

HiddenRegister.Name: Absolute Pressure Variance
HiddenRegister.Description: Noise setting for absolute pressure sensor

HiddenRegister.Name: Differential Pressure Variance
HiddenRegister.Description: Noise setting for differential pressure sensor

HiddenRegister.Name: kPa_per_volt
HiddenRegister.Description: Factor for conversion of pressure to volts

HiddenRegister.Name: rho
HiddenRegister.Description: Factor for conversion of pressure to airspeed

HiddenRegister.Name: raw_to_mbar
HiddenRegister.Description: Factor for conversion of absolute pressure to altitude

Command.Name: Get Firmware Revision
Command.Description: Causes the sensor to transmit to the current firmware revision

Command.Name: Write To Flash
Command.Description: Causes the sensor to write all current configuration settings to FLASH

Command.Name: Reset to Factory
Command.Description: Causes the UM6 to reload factory-default settings

Command.Name: Set Home Position
Command.Description: Sets the measured GPS position as position (0,0,0) for relative position reporting

Command.Name: Write to Factory
Command.Description: Causes the UM6 to save current configuration as the factory-default

Command.Name: Set mag reference
Command.Description: Causes the autopilot to use the current magnetometer measurement as the EKF reference vector

Command.Name: Start bootloader
Command.Description: Causes the MCU to restart into the bootloader

Command.Name: Zero Absolute Pressure
Command.Description: Causes the sensor to consider the current pressure as zero altitude

Command.Name: Zero Differential Pressure
Command.Description: Causes the sensor to consider the current differential pressure as zero airspeed

Command.Name: Enable Line Following
Command.Description: Enables line following and disables orbit following

Command.Name: Enable Orbit Following
Command.Description: Enables orbit following and disables line following

Command.Name: Enable Autopilot Control
Command.Description: Turns on enabled autopilot control loops
